price: 32. Engánchenlo después a una cadena de setenta codos de largo”.
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
